source:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SEQ_00Gyoshin is eager to speak with you.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限
ドーロ・イローのギョシンは、冒険者に話があるようだ。

source:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SEQ_01Gyoshin tasks you with handing out happi to potential festival participants, which in his mind includes any Namazu with time to spare. You make for Yuzuka Manor, where you will try to suss out which residents are bored and which simply suffer from resting fish face.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SEQ_01※本クエストには
「 レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限」が、
　設定されています。
　受注時と同じクラスでのみ進行できます。

ギョシンと話した。参加者を勧誘してほしいと頼まれた。ヤンサのユヅカ代官屋敷で、ナマズオたちに「」を渡して勧誘しよう。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SEQ_02<tab>You distribute happi to several Namazu in exchange for enthusiastic promises of festival participation. Some of your recruits are a bit...irregular, but considering the quantity of participants required, you are in no position to discriminate based on quality.
target: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SEQ_02<tab>ナマズオたちに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8E2801 /var>を渡した。アジムステップのドーロ・イローにいる「ギョシン」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SEQ_03<tab>Upon your return, Gyoshin gives an excited speech as a prelude to festival commencement, only to be reminded midway that he neglected to consider how to conduct the festival itself. Seigetsu the Enlightened helpfully─and at length─proposes giving an offering to the Namazu's ancestor, the Big One. This will require not only an offering from the river, but a ceremonial altar as well, for which Gyoshin is sure to have an ambitious design in mind.
target: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SEQ_03<tab>ギョシンに報告した。祭の開会宣言をしたギョシンだったが、肝心の祭の内容を決めていなかったことが判明した。光風院セイゲツの助言もあり、まずは、供物と供物台を用意することになった。ドーロ・イローの「ギョシン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SEQ_04<tab>Gyoshin asks you to contribute to the stock of components he will use to put together the altar and offering. Said stock will be collected and maintained by Gyorei, probably for safety reasons.
target: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SEQ_04<tab>ギョシンと話した。供物を捧げる儀式のために必要なものを準備し、ドーロ・イローの「ギョレイ」に納品しよう。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SEQ_05<tab>With your assistance, both altar and offering are prepared. The festival begins at last, and with it, a change in the Namazu's fortunes...or so they hope.
target: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SEQ_05<tab>供物を捧げる儀式のために必要なものをギョレイに渡した。見事、供物台が完成し、供物を捧げる祭が始まった。引き続きギョシンたちに協力し、祭を盛り上げていこう。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_TODO_00<tab>Give festive happi to potential participants.
target: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_TODO_00<tab>ユヅカ代官屋敷でナマズオたちに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8E2801 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_TODO_01<tab>Report to Gyoshin.
target: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_TODO_01<tab>ドーロ・イローのギョシンと話す

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Gyoshin.
target: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_TODO_02<tab>ギョシンと話す

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_001<tab>Festival preparations are nearly complete, yes, yes.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_001の協力もあって、
大鯰大祭の準備も、あと少しで完了するっぺよ！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_002<tab>Our task is now to find enthusiastic participants. So long as we have at least seven hundred and seventy-seven, our survival is assured! With our current number, we require only seven hundred and sixty-eight more.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_002そこで、そろそろ大祭に参加してくれる、
ナマズオたちを集め始めようと思うっぺな！
大祭と言うからには、大勢で盛り上がりたいっぺよ！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_003<tab>...Hm? You have a foreboding feeling? How curious! But never mind that. I require your help in recruiting volunteers, yes, yes.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_003……あっ、今、ちょっと嫌な予感がよぎったぺな？
ご明察、に参加者の勧誘を手伝ってもらいたいっぺよ！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_004<tab>It had slipped my mind until this moment, but I remember now that you are rather well known amongst the Namazu. Quite famous!
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_004というのも、オイラはウッカリ忘れていたんだけど、
ってば、ナマズオ界では結構な有名人っぺな！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_005<tab>You fixed Gyorin's finances, along with...other feats that I need not recall just now. The important part is that you are respected, and therefore can recruit many, many Namazu.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_005たとえば、成金屋のギョリンを助けてくれたとか……
そういった話が伝わって、密かにみんなから尊敬されてるっぺな。
その知名度……大祭成功のために、利用させてほしいっぺよ！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_006<tab>It will not take much time at all, no, no. Simply trek back to Yuzuka Manor, seek out Namazu that have no pressing duties, approach each and every one, and provide them with happi while explaining what participation in the festival entails.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_006依頼はカンタン……ヤンサのユヅカ代官屋敷まで行って、
暇そうなナマズオたちに、この「」を渡しつつ、
大祭への参加を呼びかけてほしいっぺよ！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_007<tab>We will continue preparations here in the meantime. Yes, yes. See you shortly, I am sure!
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_007オイラたちは残りの準備作業を進めておくから……
「ユヅカ代官屋敷」での勧誘、よろしく頼むっぺな！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_010<tab>Let me see... We require seven hundred seventy-seven happi...and we have twelve, so that means... Hm, do you think we need more fabric?
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_010依頼はカンタン……ヤンサの「ユヅカ代官屋敷」まで行って、
暇そうなナマズオたちに「」を渡しつつ、
大祭への参加を呼びかけてほしいっぺよ！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYORIN_000_011<tab>
target: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYORIN_000_011<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYORIN_000_020<tab>Why, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Fancy seeing you here! Have you come to look upon my fabulous apron?
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYORIN_000_020)) (( )) 02 /var>！
どうしたのん、ボクに会いに来てくれたのん？

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYORIN_000_021<tab>Oh, how gorgeous, how stunning! I can wear this happi, you say? And it will be my very own? Then yes, yes, I certainly will participate in this festival of yours.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYORIN_000_021わわっ、すごい装束なのねん！
これを着て、お祭りをするだなんて、なんだか楽しそうだよん♪

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYORIN_000_022<tab>With so many attendees, there are bound to be business opportunities as well. Yes, yes. I may just bring some of my wares with me. Somehow I still have quite a few persimmons in stock...
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYORIN_000_022それに、大勢が集まるお祭りなら、
ナマイ村で仕入れた柿も、いっぱい売れそうなのねん！
後で、顔を出させてもらうよん♪

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYORIN_000_025<tab>I will pack my surplus of persimmons and meet you there, yes, yes!
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYORIN_000_025大勢が集まるお祭りとなれば、
ナマイ村で仕入れた柿も、いっぱい売れそうなのねん！
後で、顔を出させてもらうよん♪

source:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_DRUNKNAMAZU_000_030Tea for breakfast～♪
Tea for lunch～♪
Tea at......other times～♪
...Who are you and──why are you so blurry?
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_DRUNKNAMAZU_000_030うぺっ……うぺぺ……
朝から晩まで、お茶、お茶、お茶の、べ～ろべろん♪
ひっく……なにか用っぺか～？

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_DRUNKNAMAZU_000_031<tab>Wear this for a fes-tea-val? Yes─<hic>─yes! Lead the way!
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_DRUNKNAMAZU_000_031ひっく……このハッピを着て、お祭りするっぺか～？
お茶が飲めるなら……ひっく……参加するっぺよぉ～♪

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_LEISUREDNAMAZU_000_032<tab>Breathe in, breathe out... Breathe in, breathe out... Breathe in, breathe out... Good heavens, my life is dull. Maybe I will sleep, yes, yes, perchance to dream...
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_LEISUREDNAMAZU_000_032息を吸って、息を吐いて……
息を吸って、息を吐いて、息を吸って、息を吐いて……
呼吸するのも面倒だから、そろそろ泥のように眠るっぺな……。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_LEISUREDNAMAZU_100_032<tab>...You want to speak to <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>? You must be mistaken.
target: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_LEISUREDNAMAZU_100_032<tab>ん……なにか話があるっぺか？

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_LEISUREDNAMAZU_000_033<tab>You are really, truly inviting me to a festival? Finally, a reason to live! I will don this happi forthwith and join you at the Azim Steppe.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_LEISUREDNAMAZU_000_033大鯰大祭……そんな楽しそうなことに、誘ってくれるっぺか？
なら、このハッピを着て、アジムステップに行くっぺよ！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_LEISUREDNAMAZU_000_034<tab>O glorious day! Glad am I that I kept breathing, yes, yes.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_LEISUREDNAMAZU_000_034ぺぺぺ～頑張って呼吸を続けて、
生きてきた甲斐があったっぺよぉぉぉぉ♪

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_040<tab>Ah, there you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Our preparations have gone swimmingly, yes, yes. I was on the point of calling everyone to a meeting. Just a moment, please!
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_040、おかえりなさいっぺな！
ちょうど、オイラの作業も一段落したところっぺよ！
みんなを呼んでくるから、少し待っていてほしいっぺな～！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_041<tab>I would like to express my sincere gratitude. My heartfelt appreciation. Without you, I could never have come this far. No, no.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_041……みんな、まずは感謝の気持ちを伝えさせてほしいっぺよ。
オイラの夢を信じて、遠くアジムステップまで足を運び、
ヒレと手を貸してくれて、ありがとっぺな。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_042<tab>It is only because you were willing to follow me, to travel here to the Azim Steppe, that we are here today. Because you were willing to join fins─er, hands─that we can now complete this project together.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_042おかげで、ついに準備は整ったっぺよ。
決してオイラひとりの力では、成し遂げられなかったことっぺな。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_043<tab>Before the participants arrive, I just wanted to tell you, to let you know, how much I appreciate you. Please, join us in celebration. Our efforts have borne fruit, and the fated festival is here at last!
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_043だからこそ、大勢の参加者が集う前に……
みんなの前で……宣言させてもらうっぺな……。
大鯰大祭、いよいよ開幕っぺよ！！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_044<tab>So...if I may inquire, what manner of activities does said festival entail?
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_044で……始めるとして、
大鯰大祭とは何をする祭なのだね？

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_045<tab>...
target: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_045<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_046<tab>What...manner of activities indeed. Yes...yes...
target: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_046<tab>…………なんだろっぺな？

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOREI_000_047<tab>What of your vision? Did our greatest grandsire say nothing of what sort of festival we are meant to be having?
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOREI_000_047な～にが「なんだろっぺな」っぺよ！
お告げの夢を見たのは、ギョシンだけっぺよ！？
ご先祖様は、どんなお祭りを開くように言ってたっぺか？

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_048<tab>Now that you mention it, I cannot say he did. No, no. I suppose I have been so focused on preparing the festival site that I completely, utterly forgot to think ahead. Oh dear!
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_048そういえば……説明されてないっぺよ。
オイラも祭場の準備に夢中で、内容までは考えてなかったぺな。
いやぁ～、ウッカリ、ウッカリっぺよ！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_049<tab>How irresponsible... However, I anticipated that it might come to this, so I made an effort to peruse writings relevant to our purpose.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_049やれやれ、そんなことだろうと思って、
この俺が各種文献を漁って、調べておいたぞ。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_050<tab>Wonderful! Excellent work, Gyofu─I mean, Seigetsu the Enlightened. Yes, yes.
target: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_050<tab>さっすが、ギョフ……光風院セイゲツっぺな！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_051<tab>Yes, well. The nature of our forebears' festivities, per my research, is, to put it concisely...
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_051…………まあよい。
調査結果として判明した事実を、端的に説明するとだな、
大鯰大祭とは…………

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_052<tab>...utterly unclear.
target: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_052<tab>まったく不明だ……！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_053<tab>Alas, the Namazu of eld had no system of writing, and no secondary sources detailing their festival appear to have survived the passage of the centuries.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_053いかんせん、ナマズオは文字という文化を持たなかったのでな。
数百年前に開かれた祭の内容など、記録が残っておらんのだよ！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_054<tab>That is the least informative information you could have possibly provided, Gyofun!
target: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_054<tab>ギョフンの役立たずっぺな！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_055<tab>Why you, you...you have no right to talk! Ahem. Though it is true that I was unable to learn anything regarding our people's particular traditions, my research was hardly for naught.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_055ギ……ギョシン君だけには、役立たずなどと言われたくはない！
祭の内容までは、調べきることができなかったが、
俺には俺の考えというものがあるのだ！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_056<tab>A seminal publication in the field of cultural anthropology, <var 1A 02 /var>The Chrysanthemum and the Dango<var 1A 01 /var>, states that festivals involve performative prayer and expressions of gratitude, and are intended to celebrate a given culture's gods or ancestors.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_056よいかね、伝統文化研究の先駆、『諸国風俗問状答』によれば、
そもそも祭とは、感謝や祈りを示すものであり、
先祖や神仏を祀る行為とされている。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_057<tab>Thus, we may assume that our forebears' festival would have celebrated our worthiest of ancestors, the Big One.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_057大鯰大祭と云うからには、ナマズオの祖先である、
「オオナマズ」様を祀るものと考えて、間違いはないであろう。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_058<tab>...I still have no idea what we are meant to do! No, no. Could you get to the point before we shrivel up and die?
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_058…………指示は、明確にお願いするっぺな～。
何をすればいいのか、わからんっぺな～。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_059<tab>I will enlighten you if you cease your constant interruptions! Now, as I was saying, there are myriad festivals across Othard, but at the most fundamental level, all revolve around ceremonial offerings.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_059ええい、ひとの話は最後まで聞くがよい！
世界各地には、さまざまな祭が存在しているが、
もっとも原始的な形態として、供物を捧げる儀式がある！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_060<tab>Considering the primitive Namazu's lifestyle, there is a high probability the offering would have consisted of something found in the river or thereabouts. Do you follow?
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_060文明化以前のナマズオたちの暮らしぶりから推察するに、
供物は、川や川辺で採れるものであった可能性が高いであろう。
ここまでくれば、何をすべきかわかるな？

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_061<tab>We need a...fish? For an offering. And...I hope nothing else you said was important.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_061壮絶に回りくどい話だったけど、なんとなく想像できたっぺよ。
供物そのものと、それを置くための台が必要っぺな？

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_062<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Gyorei, your help in this will be most important. Quite essential. Follow me over there, yes, yes, before Gyofun starts talking again.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_062悪いけどとギョレイは、
オイラの仕事を手伝ってほしいっぺな。
詳しいことを説明するから、向こうの空き地に来てっぺな！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOREI_000_065<tab>Despite their many, many differences, Gyoshin trusts in Gyofun's knowledge.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOREI_000_065何だかんだいいながらも、
ギョシンはギョフンのことを信頼してるっぺよ。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_070<tab>
target: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_070<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_080<tab>We can use this space to build an altar for our offering. Yes, yes. All of this derelict masonry is ripe for the remodeling.
target: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_080<tab>この空き地に、捧げ物を置くための供物台を作ろうと思うっぺな。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_081<tab>So I need you to make some sturdy altar pieces, and fast. Like the wind! The materials are in the crate by the pavilion. You can take more as needed, yes, yes.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_081には、天幕横の荷箱から素材を取って、
頑丈な「」をぺぺっと作ってほしいっぺよ！
もしも素材が足りなくなったら、荷箱を調べてっぺな！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_082<tab>So I need you to make some exquisite, lovingly detailed altar pieces. The materials are in the crate by the pavilion. You can take more as needed, yes, yes.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_082には、天幕横の荷箱から素材を取って、
手の込んだ「」を作ってほしいっぺよ！
もしも素材が足りなくなったら、荷箱を調べてっぺな！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_083<tab>So I need you to make some extremely flammable, alarmingly combustible components for the altar's bonfire. The materials are in the crate by the pavilion. You can take more as needed, yes, yes.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_083には、天幕横の荷箱から素材を取って、
焚き火をよく燃やすための「」を作ってほしいっぺよ！
もしも素材が足りなくなったら、荷箱を調べてっぺな！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_084<tab>So I need you to collect skystones for the altar's base. You will find them south of Chakha Zoh, yes, yes.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_084そこで、供物台の土台に使う、
「」を3つ集めて来てほしいっぺよ。
チャカ・ゾーの南辺りで採れるはずっぺな！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_085<tab>In the meantime, I need you to collect scarlet flax for the decorative draperies. You will find it south of Chakha Zoh, yes, yes.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_085そこで、供物台の布地に使う、
「」を3つ集めて来てほしいっぺよ。
チャカ・ゾーの南辺りで採れるはずっぺな！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_086<tab>In the meantime, I need you to collect the offering itself. One steppe barramundi, please! You can find them at Dotharl Khaa if you are willing to part with a bit of salmon roe, yes, yes.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_086そこで、ご先祖様に捧げるための、
「」を集めて来てほしいっぺよ。
「」を使えば、「ドタール・カー」で採れるはずっぺな！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_087<tab>Time to put our whiskers to the grindstone! Turn what you have over to Gyorei when finished, please. She is most insistent on keeping anything heavy, flammable, or easily broken away from me, for some reason.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_087頼んだ品が用意できたら、
ギョレイに渡しておいてほしいっぺよ。
オイラも、ほかの部材を作って準備しておくっぺな！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_088<tab>Have you run out of materials? Never fear, the crate is here! ...Well, it is actually over there. But it is full of stuff, yes, yes.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_088、素材が足りなくなったっぺか？
なら、天幕横の荷箱から必要なだけ取るっぺよ！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_100_088<tab>Have you run out of materials? Never fear, the crate is here! ...Well, it is actually over there. But it is full of stuff, yes, yes.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_100_088、素材が足りなくなったっぺか？
なら、天幕横の荷箱から必要なだけ取るっぺよ！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_110_088<tab>Have you run out of materials? Never fear, the crate is here! ...Well, it is actually over there. But it is full of stuff, yes, yes.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_110_088、素材が足りなくなったっぺか？
なら、天幕横の荷箱から必要なだけ取るっぺよ！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_200_088<tab>Turn what you have over to Gyorei when finished. I will be working here in the meantime. All the while!
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_200_088頼んだ品が用意できたら、
ギョレイに渡しておいてほしいっぺよ。
オイラも、ほかの部材を作って準備しておくっぺな！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_210_088<tab>Turn what you have over to Gyorei when finished. I will be working here in the meantime. All the while!
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_210_088頼んだ品が用意できたら、
ギョレイに渡しておいてほしいっぺよ。
オイラも、ほかの部材を作って準備しておくっぺな！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_220_088<tab>Turn what you have over to Gyorei when finished. I will be working here in the meantime. All the while!
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_220_088頼んだ品が用意できたら、
ギョレイに渡しておいてほしいっぺよ。
オイラも、ほかの部材を作って準備しておくっぺな！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_000_089<tab>The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_000_089素材が入った荷箱がある。
今は、必要なさそうだ……。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_100_089<tab>The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_100_089素材が入った荷箱がある。
今は、必要なさそうだ……。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_110_089<tab>The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_110_089素材が入った荷箱がある。
今は、必要なさそうだ……。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_120_089<tab>The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_120_089素材が入った荷箱がある。
今は、必要なさそうだ……。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_000_090<tab>You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.
target: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_000_090<tab>荷箱から必要な素材を取りだした！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_100_090<tab>You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.
target: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_100_090<tab>荷箱から必要な素材を取りだした！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_110_090<tab>You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.
target: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_110_090<tab>荷箱から必要な素材を取りだした！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_091<tab>Ready already? Then please give what you have to Gyorei for safekeeping.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOSHIN_000_091無事に依頼した品を用意できたみたいっぺな？
「ギョレイ」に渡しておいてほしいっぺよ！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOREI_000_100<tab>You have the goods, yes, yes? No, no, the <var 1A 02 /var>other<var 1A 01 /var> goods. The ones Gyoshin asked for.
target: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOREI_000_100<tab>ギョシンから頼まれていた品は、用意できたっぺか？

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOREI_000_101<tab>Thank you, thank you! Gyoshin seems to be progressing quite quickly as well. The altar will be complete any moment now, and then we can begin the festival proper.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_GYOREI_000_101ありがとっぺな！
ギョシンの準備も順調みたいだから、
一気に供物台を完成させて、お祭りを始めるっぺよ！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_000_102<tab>Working side by side with the Namazu, you have completed the altar. Festivities in honor of the Big One have begun!
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_000_102ギョシンたちと協力し、供物台を完成させた！
ナマズオの祖先「オオナマズ」に、供物を捧げる祭が始まった！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_000_103<tab>In seven years, the One River was fated to experience a fish famine, depriving the Namazu of their primary food source. Many would have died.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_000_1037年後、ヤンサの無二江流域では、
深刻な不漁が発生し、多くのナマズオが餓死する運命であった。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_000_104<tab>However, continuous fishing of large predatory fish for use as offerings over the course of seven years will allow smaller fish to flourish, creating a healthy ecosystem and ensuring bountiful catches for the foreseeable future.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_000_104しかし、無二江上流にて7年間にわたり、
供物として捧げるため大型肉食魚が採り続けられた結果、
小魚が増え、川は豊かになり、やがて豊漁が続くことになる。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_000_105<tab>Unbeknownst to all, the Namazu will be spared the grievous tragedy that could have consumed them, and their fate continues to change for the better.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_000_105滅びの運命は変わり始めた。
かくして7年後に起こるべき悲劇は、人知れず回避されたのだ！

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_000_106<tab>You have achieved <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Trusted<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> reputation with the Seven Hundred Seventy-Seven.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_000_106「ナマズオ族：大鯰大祭実行委員会」との友好関係が、
「信頼」になりました。
供物台の製作に力を貸したことで、信頼を勝ち得たようです。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_000_107<tab>New Namazu beast tribe daily quests are now available from Seigetsu the Enlightened at Dhoro Iloh.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_000_107これ以降、ドーロ・イローにいる「光風院セイゲツ」より、
新たな「蛮族デイリークエスト」を受注することができます。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_000_108<tab>Furthermore, you will be able to undertake three additional quests from Seigetsu the Enlightened as a reputation bonus. This bonus is available until the daily reset time for beast tribe quests.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_000_108なお、友好ランクが上がった当日に限り、
「光風院セイゲツ」から受注できるデイリークエストの数が、
ボーナスとして、3つ追加されています。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_000_109<tab>These additional quests will become available after accepting all current daily quests from Seigetsu the Enlightened. Please be advised that you cannot undertake these quests if you have no remaining allowances.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_000_109友好ランクが上がる前に発行されたデイリークエストを、
すべて受注するとボーナス分が発行され、
受注権のある限り、これを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>You now have access to a wider selection of wares from Gyosho.
target:
TEXT_BANNAM002_03098_SYSTEM_000_110また、「ギョショウ」より、
「友好関係：信頼」の商品を購入できるようになりました。
今後の冒険に役立てましょう！
